name: Stickyman 3D
description:
Greetings you guys and girls.

Do you like Styckyman? But he is not sticky.

Then I suggest you try this game.

Styckyman is an isometric 3D Battle Arena with the possibility of a Local Multiplayer.

Game based on Unity Engine. Character movement based on physics.

2 - 4 players on arena. Ability to add a AI BOTs.

There are shots with hands and legs. There are also 4 types of weapons: Rifle, Pistol, Shotgun and Sword.

Controls in the game supports both the classic keyboard and various gamepads (checked on Xbox One gamepad).

Since the game at the development stage is still 1 arena.

If you want to support a novice developer, you can help on this page.

Also link to Patreon channel https://www.patreon.com/Ozzygames

Work on the project goes every day. But I hope not in vain I create this project.
